The container component is used to create atomic layout constructs.

## Slots

| Slot          | Description                                                                          |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|               | Passes the content to the container.                                                 |
| `"highlight"` | Passes a highlight element to the container that follows the mouse on the container. |
